name: Noodle Knight
description:
Control the heroic Noodle Knight as they face off against the ferocious Rook Knight.

Using either a keyboard or a controller, move about the arena and swing your spoon to deal damage on Rook Knight. Rook Knight won't go down easy, so avoid their knife by jumping out of the way. For specific controls, go into the "Controls" menu in game to look up the buttons and rebind them to your liking.

There are a few known issues. If controls don't work on the first menu right away, refresh the page and try again. The quit button will also just stop the game from running but will not close it or allow you to restart the game. Similarly, refresh the page to make the "Run game" button return. The game was also built with a DualShock 4 in mind, so use the South button to select a menu option.

This game was made for the Minneapolis College of Art and Design course, "Intermediate 3D."

Concept, arena model, and character rigging: Connor Benson

Animation: Kennedy Patterson

Programming: Calvin Evans

Fonts:

Canterbury Font: https://www.1001fonts.com/canterbury-font.html

Source Sans Pro: https://www.1001fonts.com/source-sans-pro-font.html

Provided by YouTube Audio Library and MCAD Sound Effects Library
